name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: The iPhone 15 Pro features a titanium frame, A17 Bionic chip, and a 48MP camera. It delivers outstanding performance, a ProMotion display, and improved battery life, making it a premium flagship choice.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is a high-end flagship phone with an advanced 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and S-Pen integration. Designed for power users and professionals.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google Pixel 8 Pro comes with AI-enhanced photography, Google Tensor G3 chipset, and a 50MP camera. Its pure Android experience and long software support make it a great choice.

name: Xiaomi 14 Ultra
description: Xiaomi 14 Ultra is a premium smartphone with Leica-tuned cameras, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and a 1-inch sensor for stunning photography. A top-tier flagship for photography lovers.

name: OnePlus 12
description: OnePlus 12 offers a fast and smooth experience with a 120Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and 100W fast charging. A perfect balance of performance and price.

name: ASUS ROG Phone 8
description: ASUS ROG Phone 8 is the ultimate gaming phone, featuring a 165Hz display, RGB lighting, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and an advanced cooling system for intense gaming sessions.
